name: CeCe
description:
Experience a day in the life of CeCe, an artificial intelligence turned personal assistant who lives in a cell phone developed by the KiwiTech corporation. Answer inane questions about the weather! Organize your owner's Instagram pics! Dream of a better life beyond the confines of the Microchip!

Features:

  • Gameplay inspired by the Adventure and Simulator game genres
  • Two different endings
A short game made for Ludum Dare 37 (Theme: One Room)

Ludum Dare Submission Page
